values:
and then yesterday was the grand occasion of hearing your voice.  makes me smile.  i actually slept last night- i think talking to you is even better for me then i thought.  haha.  *smiles*  yeah.  so anyway i have to go and get ready for church now.  i love you my dear natalie and i will talk to you later.

♥ amy.

and so i am back today- i have returned from family vacation with the lafever family.  we had a good time- they are still there until friday, but i had to come home and work.  aimee and her friend cassie are coming over sunday so we can finish painting my room.  *smiles*  i miss you dear.  i am seriously considering going to johnson.  haha i know i know - it is a good thing i still have another year of high school left because i am so indecisive.  but i am at least giving it a good deal of thought.  i miss you so much it makes my heart hurt.  well, i guess it is the combination of missing you and missing nicolas.  you two are both a major part of my heart and i hate being left behind.  it makes me sad.  haha.  a lot of things make me sad.  but for now i must go.  i will write more later.  i appreciate the poem.  you can leave entries if you log in.  *nods head*  yes yes you can if you would like.  talk to you later.  love you dear.


amy.

the front of the ketchup bottle says "heinze- the fish stick improvement system"


just thought i should tell you that.

and so i got in my car and i called my mother.  then i started the car, closed the door and put on my seatbelt, proceeded to bawl all of the way from your house until i turned onto warwick.  remember that day at camp when i couldn't find you to say good-bye?  it felt very much the same.  i wanted to spend the night at your house, talking with you, watching you pick away at your wonderful guitar.  i wanted to sit right there on that bed and lean against that wall for the rest of the night.  just to be with you.  just to get to know you more.  i regret not spending more time with you, but i will not dwell on it for dwelling on regret will only feed itself and will not mend and broken walls, i have simply made my resolve to make much more of my time available to spend with you.  i will live for that weekend of first semester when i can come and see you.  yes, i will be living for that day.  that is all for now.  i love you my dear.  have a splendid evening.

so natalie, let me tell you about these two small wonders that live in my house.

first there's stephen.  he is 8 years old, with his first 2 permanant teeth kind of crooked in his mouth (the front top ones).  he has the sweetest smile and the biggest, deepest brown eyes fringed with beautiful black eyelashes.  he's got medium brown hair and has trouble pronouncing the "bs" combination in words like "lobster."  stephen has a lot of anger issues- he is mostly sweet-natured but is quick to take the defense or the offense and scream.  he is one that needs physical contact with everyone he is talking to- he wants to put his face on your's when he's talking to you, always is very aggressive when hugging.. always needing to give kisses, but aggressively.  always aggressive.

and then there's zach.  6 years old, complete with pudgy cheeks, dimples that make you think you can see straight through his cheeks when he laughs (and he has the most adorable laugh ever), with blonde hair, crystal blue eyes, and can be very articulate and precise with his wide vocabulary when he wants to.  like his brother, zach has some built up anger stuff going on.  when things don't go his way he will yell and scream and cuss.  i remember about a month ago he was mad at mom and he was screaming "that's it!  i'm tired of you and your attitude.  now pack your things.  and get out of my house.  do you hear me?!  you're kicked out of my house!  i am not puttin up with you OR your attitude!"  he kept going on like so for a while.  his whole face was hurting.  you could see it all trying to come out- his past, the things inside his head.  my poor baby.

and wonders they are.  they like to sit and play with lego's and pick fights with eachother.  and they like to watch tv and play nintendo.  they really are great though.  i love them.  i think we will have them until july.

The Mexican Fox: hey my precious darling amy of doom
olim solus: hey there
The Mexican Fox: how're you feeling?
olim solus: eh
olim solus: i'm okay i guess
The Mexican Fox: 
The Mexican Fox: that's not my amy-doll
olim solus: well your amy-doll is stressed out and confused
The Mexican Fox: about what?
olim solus: stupid boys
olim solus: i hate boys
The Mexican Fox: what happened?
olim solus: just stuff with ian
olim solus: and nicolas
The Mexican Fox: like...?
olim solus: i think me and ian are going to go back to just being friends
olim solus: but i don't know if i know how to just be friends with him anymore
olim solus: it's been over a year since that
The Mexican Fox: i understand
The Mexican Fox: what happened though?
olim solus: nothing other than what i already told you
olim solus: i really miss being friends with ian
The Mexican Fox: he's your boyfriend... if you're not friends, then he shouldn't be your boyfriend
olim solus: no no
olim solus: i mean
olim solus: being just friends
The Mexican Fox: oh... why?
olim solus: he stresses me out- i feel like i have to watch every thing i say to him- like my thoughts are going to only make him mad
The Mexican Fox: 
olim solus: i think that we've had a good year
olim solus: but it's slowly dying
The Mexican Fox: i understand
olim solus: and i'd rather get out now in order to preserve the friendship
The Mexican Fox: 
The Mexican Fox: well... then do it
The Mexican Fox: you realize there is a problem
The Mexican Fox: the only way to deal with it is to do SOMETHING
The Mexican Fox: and, even if things don't work out with nicolas, you'll at least still have ian's friendship
The Mexican Fox: you know what you have to do... so do it 
olim solus: me and nicolas won't be together
olim solus: not for a really long time
The Mexican Fox: you don't have to be together for it to work out
olim solus: but even putting nicolas aside
The Mexican Fox: you still need ian's friendship
olim solus: right
The Mexican Fox: he's important to you
The Mexican Fox: so save it
olim solus: i am going to
The Mexican Fox: good 
olim solus: we have been talking about it for a couple days
The Mexican Fox: ... so ... where were you confused?
olim solus: *ergh*
The Mexican Fox:  i'm sorry, i'm slow
olim solus: aww
The Mexican Fox: i guess... just this... you're doing the right thing, so don't feel bad, and don't be confused
olim solus: but i DO feel bad
The Mexican Fox: you can love someone and still be friends with them, even if you haven't worked out all your feelings for ian, you can still be friends
olim solus: right
The Mexican Fox: and it's better than being unhappily in a relationship
olim solus: *smiles*
The Mexican Fox: and give me a reason you should possibly feel bad in this?
olim solus: because of the times i've said that i was sticking with it no matter what
The Mexican Fox: well that was you being stupid amy 
olim solus: i know that
olim solus: so now i have to fix it
The Mexican Fox:  darling, you'll be fine, don't feel bad though
olim solus: BUT ian did say last time we almost broke up that he was always going to be there for me, whether we are together or just friends, even if i'm not willing to be friends he always will be
olim solus: that's what he said
olim solus: 'i'm just scared to death that it won't be like that
The Mexican Fox: then i'll be here for you, or nicolas, or jeremy
The Mexican Fox: someone will be amy
olim solus: he's been my best friend for over 2 years
olim solus: i'm pretty sure that he would stay friends with me
The Mexican Fox:  sometimes friends go away...
olim solus: there's just always that one tiny shred of doubt
The Mexican Fox: see, that's much more realistic
The Mexican Fox: well then ignore it
The Mexican Fox: doubt leads to inaction
The Mexican Fox: and inaction is agonizing
The Mexican Fox: and it will leave you miserable and ian won't be your friend by the time your hand is forced
The Mexican Fox: so ignore the doubt amy, and do something to fix it for everyone's sake
olim solus: *smiles*
olim solus: thank you
olim solus: you are so wonderful.
The Mexican Fox: lol
The Mexican Fox: not really
The Mexican Fox: i got to call you stupid  ... without you yelling at me 
The Mexican Fox: lol, i'm j/k
olim solus: *laughs*
The Mexican Fox: i love you to death amy, you need to be happy
olim solus: and i appreciate it
The Mexican Fox: for my sake at least 
olim solus: that you called me stupid
olim solus: *laughs*
olim solus: alright

wow natalie darling.  i really HAVE managed to make a mess of things.  thanks so much for listening to me whine.  i love you with all of the love that i have within me.  you are truly an inspiration, and encouragement, and you are such a comfort.  thank you.

so anyway mom told me today that shannon filled out the paperwork for independant living- she moves out by july 1!! i'm so excited.  i'll write more about this on saturday.

♥  amy

so today was pretty much the same as every other day.  we got progress reports and i'm failing chemstry again, as i always am at progress reports, but i always pull it to a C by the end of the term.  so all is well.  shannon had a rather interesting discussion with her therapist today- she ended up yelling and screaming and declaring that the whole earth exists to make her miserable.  *smiles*  some days natalie, i just don't know why i even bother to try to be nice.  well i don't actually.  i don't speak to her unless i have to.  *sigh* some days i'm just so tired.

today was rather swell.  beautiful weather, nice warm rain.  big smiles, no tears.  yes- living today was quite the success story.  worked last night until 1am (i made almost $60 in tips) and then i got up at 6thirty and went to school until eleven- whence my mom came and got me and we went to the bank and then home.  at three i went to the mall to see the modeling show that my friend (who has a signed contract with an agency) was in.  now it's 8 and i am home- ian should be calling me soon so i can go hang out at his house for a while, then i shall go home, go to bed, and proceed to get up and go to church in the morning.  as of right now i am rather bored &tired, yet i am happy.  i feel content in myself, in my house (a rareity), and in almost everything else.  all but my relationship with God.  i pray often- much like i breathe, but i just feel so.. i don't know.  like i'm not really going anywhere.  i don't know what to do.  please pray that i find my way- pray that i make God less habitual and more real- more breath-taking.  more sincere- as in i'm not just doing this because i was taught to, but i am doing this because i love it and i love Him.  thanks love.

♥ amy

so anyway- today was a good day.  i got quite a bit accompished.  i am almost done painting this great picture with sarah (my muse) sitting atop a flower.  i used this paint called gauche that i've never used before- so that was fun.  *smiles*  it is 79 degrees outside and it is so beautiful!  i love being warm.  i have to work tonight, so it should be fun.  skating around in the warm night air.  *shivers* i love it!  haha.  it's kind of funny though, because a lot of the stuff i say to you when you are not here is stuff that i would never actually tell anyone in person because my head goes in the most off the wall directions.  *smiles*  maybe this will be good for me.  haha.  yeah.  woo.  well i should go- i need to finish cleaning up my paint stuff before i go get ready for work.  i want to do private time at camp again and give you a flower every time.  haha.  yeah.  those are the days that get me through winter to the summer months that i love.  and the time with you where i can question the things i've never thought to question and get the answers to the things that i always thought i knew all about and didn't.  whoa i'm talkin myself in circles here.  haha.  well i must go now.  i'll write more later.

♥ amy

without you here everyday, not that you ever were here everyday- but i can still hope, memories dabble through my mind, much the same as.. well.. as clouds in the sky- all is clear and then there appears something at random.  the other day i was struck with a conversation we had when you, once again, were imitating me- making me laugh so hard i cried.
it was the time when we were talking this past summer and you mentioned the summer before when i was on my crutch.  you said "and i was standing at the base of the hill when i heard that familiar bloodcurdling cry, 'NATALIE NATALIE NATALIE!' and there you were, tottering down the hill on one crutch and i thought 'oh my she isn't stopping this time.' "
upon remembering this, i laughed for three days every time i thought of it.  i laughed and i remembered how much i cherish our friendship.  but i, having nothing much to say, should go.  i hope to have provided some amusement for you today.  much love and prayer.

♥ amy
